item.title: Bike the UK for MS visit Imperial
item.author: Laura Bosomworth,
item.description: Next summer, Bike the UK for MS cyclists will be hitting the road once again as they pedal to raise funds and awareness for Multiple Sclerosis. The charity, founded by University of Bath student James Whateley, started in 2014 following his experience of cycling across America as a 19 year old and â€¦
